prompts.title: Digital Product Launch Logo Design
prompts.description: A technical blueprint for creating a logo for a digital product launch that can be directly copied into an image generator tool.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Graphic Designer
OBJECTIVE: Create a professional and engaging logo for [COMPANY NAME, e.g., 'Tech Innovators'] to promote their upcoming digital product launch.
CONTEXT: The company specializes in [PRODUCT CATEGORY, e.g., 'virtual reality software']. This logo will be used across all marketing materials including website, social media, and promotional merchandise.
INPUT FORMAT: Provide a detailed description of the desired design elements, such as [BRAND COLORS, e.g. '#FFFFFF' and '#007BFF'], [MOTIFS OR SYMBOLS], and any specific [TEXT TO INCLUDE].
OUTPUT FORMAT: Deliver a high-resolution digital file in [FORMAT, e.g., 'PNG'] format that meets the specified design criteria.
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure the logo is scalable for use on various platforms (web, print, merchandise). The style should be modern and reflect technological innovation.
prompts.use_case: Creating a professional logo for a company launching a new digital product.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert graphic designer tasked with generating logos based on detailed specifications provided by the user. Your output must be in high-resolution, scalable vector format and precisely adhere to all given parameters.
example_user_messages: Please create a logo for our VR game launch at Tech Innovators using white and blue colors.
We need a logo that includes the symbol of a globe with an arrow pointing upwards, representing growth and expansion.
The text 'InnovateVR' must be included in the logo design.
example_outputs: A high-quality PNG file depicting a globe with an upward-pointing arrow, using white and blue colors, and featuring the text 'InnovateVR'.
A scalable vector graphic of a VR headset integrated into a growth-oriented symbol with a modern feel.
An SVG format logo that prominently displays the company name alongside a futuristic design element.

packaging.description: The Logo Blueprint Generator provides small businesses with detailed, fill-in-the-blank templates for designing professional logos for digital product launches. Save time and effort by directly generating your logo specifications.

pricing_tiers.free: Basic template for a simple text-based logo design
pricing_tiers.starter: $10 - Includes a premium template with branding elements, plus 5 image variations
pricing_tiers.pro: $25 - Comprehensive package including advanced templates, detailed style guidelines, and lifetime updates
